item.title: US kills 14 in strikes on four alleged drug boats in Pacific
item.description: It is the latest in a series of attacks on boats the US says have been carrying drugs in both the Pacific and Caribbean.

item.title: Pregnant British teenager's family pay Â£137,000 to reduce sentence in Georgia jail
item.description: The pregnant 19-year-old faces drugs charges in Georgia and is back in court on Monday.

item.title: Israel says coffin from Hamas did not contain another hostage's body
item.description: Israel accuses Hamas of a "clear violation" of the ceasefire deal after tests showed the remains belonged to a person whose body was previously return...

item.title: Amazon confirms 14,000 job losses in corporate division
item.description: The company says the opportunities provided by AI means it needs to be "organised more leanly."

item.title: Tourist plane crash in Kenya kills 11 on board
item.description: The aircraft was flying from a popular coastal resort to a game park when it came down.
